valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 5 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Fastnet 999 moving rather quickly east and losing its identity by midnight tonight. Low Southeast Iceland 990 losing its identity by same time
